00064 class NTBP_hranvier_sodium_multi_current_o : public NTBP_multi_current_o {
00065 public:
00066 /***   Constructors, Copy/Assignment and Destructor  ***/
00067 NTBP_hranvier_sodium_multi_current_o(NTreal area /* in muMeter^2 */,
00068                                                                          NTreal density = 110 /* in num/muMeter^2 */,
00069                                                                          NTreal channelConductance = 1.3e-8, /* in mSiemens per channel = 13pS */
00070                                                                          NTreal vBase = -84/* in mV */
00071                                                                      );
00072 NTBP_hranvier_sodium_multi_current_o(const NTBP_hranvier_sodium_multi_current_o & original);
00073 const NTBP_hranvier_sodium_multi_current_o & operator= (const NTBP_hranvier_sodium_multi_current_o & right);
00074 virtual ~NTBP_hranvier_sodium_multi_current_o();
00075 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00077 NTreal ComputeChannelStateTimeConstant() const;
00078 NTreturn StepCurrent();
00079 NTreal OpenChannels() const;
00080 NTreal ComputeConductance();
00081 void ComputeRateConstants(NTreal vM /* in mV */);
00082 void ShowChannelStatePopulation() { channelsPtr->ShowStates(); }
00083 void Show() {  cout << " alphaM= " << alphaM << "\t betaM= " << betaM << "\t openRatio= " << ((double)channelsPtr->NumOpen())/channelsPtr->_numChannels()
00084                    << "\t alphaH= " << alphaH << "\t betaH= " << betaH << "\t openNum= " << channelsPtr->NumOpen();}
00085 NTreal AlphaM(NTreal vM /* in mV */) {   vM += _vBase(); return 1.86*(vM+18.4)/(1-exp((-18.4-vM)/10.3));}
00086 NTreal BetaM(NTreal vM /* in mV */) {   vM += _vBase(); return 0.0860*(-22.7-vM)/(1-exp((vM+22.7)/9.16)); }
00087 NTreal AlphaH(NTreal vM /* in mV */) {  vM += _vBase(); return 0.0336*(-111.0-vM)/(1-exp((vM+111.0)/11.0)); }
00088 NTreal BetaH(NTreal vM /* in mV */) {   vM += _vBase(); return 2.30/(1+exp((-28.8-vM)/13.4)); }
00090 void ShowParam() const;
00091 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00092 protected:
00093 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00094 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00095 private:
00096 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00097 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00098 static NT_gaussian_rnd_dist_o normalRnd; // notice, sometimes a linker error is produced, which can be removed by adding a NT_gaussian_..._o object at the beginning of the main() code.
00099 
00100 static bool initTableLookUp;
00101 
00102 NTreal baseTemp; // C
00103 NTreal alphaM;
00104 NTreal betaM;
00105 NTreal m;
00106 NTreal noiseM;
00107 static NTreal alphaMvec[15000];
00108 static NTreal betaMvec[15000];
00109 NTreal q10m;
00110 
00111 NTreal alphaH;
00112 NTreal betaH;
00113 NTreal h;

00116 static NTreal betaHvec[15000];
00117 NTreal q10h;
